languages.text: Противники в области действия получают штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП. Также они не могут использовать психосилы.
languages.original_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Противники в области действия получают штрафы к уклонению, Дальнему Бою и количеству ОП. Также они не могут использовать психосилы.

traits.locale_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a penalty to dodge, BS, and MP. They also cannot use any psychic powers.

Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

languages.text: 区域内所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此外，所有受影响的敌人都无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}。
languages.original_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 区域内所有敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此外，所有受影响的敌人都无法使用{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}。

languages.text: 一帯の敵生物は{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を課される。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用できない。
languages.original_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 一帯の敵生物の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を付与。さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}を使用不可にする。

languages.text: Las criaturas enemigas en el área sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. Además, no pueden usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Las criaturas enemigas en el área sufren una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}. También les impide usar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}.

languages.text: Feindliche Kreaturen innerhalb des Bereichs erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Darüber hinaus können sie keine {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionischen Kräfte{/g} nutzen.
languages.original_text: Enemy creatures within the area suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}. They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Feindliche Kreaturen innerhalb des Bereichs erleiden einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}. Darüber hinaus können sie keine {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionischen Kräfte{/g} nutzen.

languages.text: Les créatures ennemies présentes dans la zone subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. Et elles ne peuvent pas utiliser de {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}.

They also cannot use any {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les créatures ennemies présentes dans la zone subissent une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}. languages.text: Alan içindeki düşman yaratıklar; {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} değerlerine {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Ayrıca hiçbir {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi gücünü{/g} kullanamazlar.
